game.name: Apostle: Rebellion
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A sci-fi, turn-based RPG. Humanity has reached a point where the majority of people opt to become cyborgs called Roids. However, social inequality is once again at a breaking point.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A sci-fi, turn-based RPG. Humanity has reached a point where the majority of people opt to become cyborgs called Roids. However, social inequality is once again at a breaking point.

reviewHighlights.text: 전작(Apostle)의 주인공이 세계를 구하고 오랜시간이 지난 뒤 환경오염, 전쟁 등으로 세상은 황폐화되었고, 남은 이들은 Neo-Eden이라는 터전을 만들어 살아간다. 하지만 이 터전도 평화롭지만은 않은데... 장점 : 대꼴, 풀보이스, Live2D, 타게임 홍보용...
